release.change: Breaking Change: Updated User Agent String format to also include the WebView User Agent
Breaking Change: Send sensor attributes as a list instead of string when possible
Add theming to widgets: Dynamic Color (Material You) and Transparent
Add new notification parameter for notification visibility/sensitivity
Add new high accuracy location setting to combine zone and bluetooth constraints
Allow multiple media players per widget
Speed up service call widget execution
Register for shutdown intent to send one final sensor update before device turns off
Sync sensors enabled state with Home Assistant core (requires: HA Core 2022.6+)
Save last crash info and show it in Companion App Logs
Improve time zone sensor state
Add a sensor for high accuracy update interval
Suggest or highlight current SSID in home SSID dialog
Add new notification command to allow for changing Persistent Connection setting
Allow persistent connection to work when the device has no internet
Migrate Manage Sensors screen to Compose, small design tweaks and speed improvements
Add a network transport sensor
Allow changing high accuracy update interval via notification command
Add a new notification command to launch an app with only the package name, if app is not installed user will be taken to install the app
Add missing volume level sensors and allow control via notification command for some of them
Bug fixes, performance improvements, design tweaks and dependency updates
